abstract: Brazilian Pres Dilma Rousseff defends her first-term record in inauguration speech after being sworn in to second term in office; Rousseff speaks of her intention to fight graft.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Rousseff’s narrow victory in October and the weakening of her governing coalition among lawmakers will make it harder for her to tackle the challenges she faces, experts said.
snippet: Ms. Rousseff’s narrow victory in October and the weakening of her governing coalition among lawmakers will make it harder for her to tackle the challenges she faces, experts said.

headline.main: President Dilma Rousseff of Brazil Begins 2nd Term Vowing to Fight Graft
headline.print_headline: Brazil’s President Begins 2nd Term Vowing to Fight Graft
